description.long:
Selcom is the fast, easy, secure way to accept mobile payments and mobile online. PAY WITH SELCOM empowers any business across the country to receive and also make payments from the convenience of a mobile phone. 

## Apply for Selcom APIs 
[Apply and request for the API documentation »](https://www.selcom.net/)
